long_description.value:
Automatic, same day redaction of all Payment Card Information from calls in English recorded within the Zendesk Talk application.
*Available for all Talk Feature Plans – Lite, Team, Professional, Enterprise and Partner Edition.   
*$5 a month per PCI-handling Zendesk Talk Agent, with free 1 month trial for all, retained as your first month free when you proceed.
*No charge for non-Talk / Support-only Agents, or for Talk Agents who don’t handle PCI.  
*No separate account subscription charge (unlike other PCI redaction providers). 

Features:
*Intelligent Voice detects and redacts credit card information in both the audio file and the transcript.
*Optionally ,all call recordings in Zendesk Support tickets can have an English language transcript attached.
*Find words and phrases inside your call recordings using Zendesk search.
*Transcript text available for Triggers and other Zendesk Apps.

Any questions?  We’d love to hear from you!  Email support@intelligentvoice.com or visit our dedicated Zendesk Support portal at https://support.intelligentvoice.com/hc/en-us/categories/115000404174-Zendesk-Talk-PCI-redaction

installation_instructions.value:
*Note: recordings in Zendesk Support from systems other than Zendesk Talk may not work if they require additional authentication.  Please contact Intelligent Voice if this affects you*
1. Install the App from the Zendesk store. 
2. Log into your Zendesk as an admin user and create a new Zendesk API token https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/226022787-Generating-a-new-API-token-
3. Register the API token at https://www.intelligentvoice.com/register/ with:
* Your new Zendesk API token 
* Your email address
* Your Zendesk subdomain: subdomain.zendesk.com
4. Check that you have received an email from support@intelligentvoice.com “Thank you for registering for Intelligent Voice transcription with PCI redaction”
5. To help you comply with PCI DSS regulations:
* The App will delete the original recording after the new one has been added to the ticket.
* Zendesk Talk can also be configured to delete the original unredacted copy of the recording before the compliance period is exceeded, e.g. 1 day.
* Retention Period configuration is per Zendesk Talk phone number
* Zendesk admin users can also manually delete any recording
* Details from https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/213857708-Managing-recording-options-in-Zendesk-Talk 
6. If you have agents who do not use Zendesk, restrict the billing accordingly.  This is done by restricting the App to a Zendesk Group containing only PCI- handling Talk agents.    
Details from https://support.intelligentvoice.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004411834-Changing-the-number-of-agents
